targets.rawSql: select sum(abs(`change`)) as total_deposit from user_balance_history where business = "deposit" and asset = "$Asset";
select sum(abs(`change`)) as total_withdraw from user_balance_history where business = "withdraw" and asset = "$Asset";
select count(1) as total_deposit_count from user_balance_history where business = "deposit" and asset = "$Asset";
select count(1) as total_withdraw_count from user_balance_history where business = "withdraw" and asset = "$Asset";
select sum(abs(`change`)) as total_fee from user_balance_history where business = "fee" and asset = "$Asset";
select total from user_insurance_history where asset = "$Asset" order by id desc limit 1
select sum(abs(`change`)) as total_deposit from user_balance_history where business = "deposit" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` >= (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - MOD(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 86400));
select sum(abs(`change`)) as total_withdraw from user_balance_history where business = "withdraw" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` >= (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - MOD(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 86400));
select count(1) as total_deposit_count from user_balance_history where business = "deposit" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` >= (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - MOD(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 86400));
select count(1) as total_withdraw_count from user_balance_history where business = "withdraw" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` >= (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - MOD(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 86400));
select sum(abs(`change`)) as total_fee from user_balance_history where business = "fee" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` >= (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - MOD(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 86400));
select sum(`change`) as total from user_insurance_history where asset = "$Asset" and `time` >= (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - MOD(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 86400));

select bb.atime as time, sum(bb.deposit_amount) as deposit_amount, sum(bb.withdraw_amount) as withdraw_amount, sum(bb.deposit_amount - bb.withdraw_amount) as net_amount from
(select b.atime, (case b.`business` when 'deposit' then b.sum_change else 0 end) deposit_amount, (case b.`business` when 'withdraw' then b.sum_change else 0 end) withdraw_amount
from (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CAST(from_unixtime(floor(user_balance_history.`time`)) AS DATE)) as atime,
                                                                   `business`,
                                                                   sum(abs(`change`)) as sum_change
                                                            from user_balance_history
                                                            where asset = "$Asset"
                                                              and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600)                                                  
                                                            group by atime,`business` having `business` in ("deposit","withdraw")
                                                           ) as b) as bb group by bb.atime order by bb.atime desc

select bb.atime as time, sum(bb.deposit_count) as deposit_count, sum(bb.withdraw_count) as withdraw_count from
(select b.atime,(case b.`business` when 'deposit' then b.count_change else 0 end) deposit_count, (case b.`business` when 'withdraw' then b.count_change else 0 end) withdraw_count 
from (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CAST(from_unixtime(floor(user_balance_history.`time`)) AS DATE)) as atime,
                                                                    `business`,
                                                                    count(1) as count_change
                                                             from user_balance_history
                                                             where asset = "$Asset"
                                                               and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) 
                                                             group by atime,`business` having `business` in ("deposit","withdraw")
                                                            ) as b) as bb group by bb.atime order by bb.atime desc

panels.title: 用户每日充提次数统计

targets.rawSql:
select bb.atime as time, sum(bb.send_count) as send_count, sum(bb.recycle_count) as recycle_count from
(select b.atime,(case b.`business` when 'experience_fund_reward_send' then b.count_change else 0 end) send_count, (case b.`business` when 'experience_fund_reward_recycle' then b.count_change else 0 end) recycle_count 
from (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CAST(from_unixtime(floor(user_balance_history.`time`)) AS DATE)) as atime,
                                                                    `business`,
                                                                    count(1) as count_change
                                                             from user_balance_history
                                                             where asset = "$Asset"
                                                               and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) 
                                                             group by atime,`business` having `business` in ("experience_fund_reward_send","experience_fund_reward_recycle")
                                                            ) as b) as bb group by bb.atime order by bb.atime desc

panels.title: 用户每日体验金领取次数统计

targets.rawSql:
select b.atime as time,b.sum_change as fee from (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CAST(from_unixtime(floor(user_balance_history.`time`)) AS DATE)) as atime,
                                                           sum(abs(`change`)) as sum_change
                                                    from user_balance_history
                                                    where asset = "$Asset"
                                                      and business = "fee"
                                                      and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) 
                                                    group by atime
                                                    order by atime desc
                                                   ) as b

select b.atime as time,b.sum_change as risk from (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CAST(from_unixtime(floor(user_insurance_history.`time`)) AS DATE)) as atime,
                                                           sum(`change`) as sum_change
                                                    from user_insurance_history
                                                    where asset = "$Asset"
                                                      and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) 
                                                    group by atime
                                                    order by atime desc
                                                   ) as b

select user_id, sum(`change`) as deposit_amount from user_balance_history where business = "deposit" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) group by user_id order by deposit_amount desc;

select user_id, sum(abs(`change`)) as withdraw_amount from user_balance_history where business = "withdraw" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) group by user_id order by withdraw_amount desc;

select user_id, sum(`change`) as net_amount from user_balance_history where business in("deposit","withdraw") and asset = "$Asset" and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) group by user_id order by net_amount desc;

select user_id, count(1) as trade_count from user_balance_history where business = "trade" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) group by user_id order by trade_count desc;

select p.user_id, sum(`change`) as profit, abs(b.fee) as fee from user_balance_history as p left join (select user_id, sum(`change`) as fee from user_balance_history where business = "fee" and asset = "$Asset" and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) group by user_id)
    as b on b.user_id = p.user_id where p.business = "trade" and p.asset = "$Asset" and p.`time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600) group by p.user_id order by profit desc;

select a.user_id, count(1) as risk_count from (select user_id, position_id from user_insurance_history where (asset = "$Asset" and `time` > (unix_timestamp() - $Days * 24 * 3600)) group by user_id,position_id) as a group by a.user_id order by risk_count desc;
